Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

Note that all the texts in this document that refer to two people - the speaker and the one spoken too - that can both be male or female.
Note that use of the 'localized' and 'alternative localized string' only applies for the gender of the speaker.
If the gender of the person spoken to requires inflection, please try to translate the text in a way that doesn't require such inflection. If this is impossible, please get in touch with us informing us of which lines this concerns and how they would be inflected in the language you are translating too.

Não pense que sua presença aqui passou despercebida, {STR_leaderName} da {STR_playerRace}. Nossos agentes vivem entre vocês há gerações. Nossas avaliações sobre sua espécie são… desfavoráveis. Quais são suas intenções aqui?

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Nossos agentes nos informaram que suas forças acabariam se esgueirando até nossas fronteiras. Nossos soldados dedicaram suas vidas a aprimorar suas habilidades. Ousa nos provocar?

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Fique onde está, {STR_leaderName}, ou testemunhará o poder da superioridade militar Shakarn. Fale agora e deixe claras suas intenções enquanto ainda tenho paciência.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Enfim nos encontramos, {STR_leaderName}. Estamos observando você há algum tempo. O que o trouxe a este território?

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Seria sensato reconhecer nossas fronteiras, {STR_leaderName}, e não ignorar as reivindicações que fazemos sobre esta região. Que motivos trazem sua facção até nós?

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

Considere-se afortunado por testemunhar o poder dos Shakarn. Grandes planos, que vêm sendo preparados por gerações, estão começando a se desenrolar. Você se tornará parte deles ou um obstáculo a ser esmagado?

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

Temos nossos motivos para estar neste mundo, e você tem os seus, {STR_leaderName}. Nossa missão é da mais alta importância, e não podemos perder tempo com formalidades. Mantenha distância, a menos que tenha assuntos urgentes a tratar.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Saudações, {STR_leaderName}, eu estava aguardando sua chegada. Temos o dever de nos apresentar, mas isso será um prazer.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Suas ações justas foram observadas pelo Cetro Escarlate, comandante {STR_leaderName}. Vamos iniciar a comunicação imediatamente.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Não perca nosso tempo, {STR_leaderName}. O Cetro Escarlate tem questões mais importantes.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Podemos dedicar um momento do nosso tempo, não mais que isso.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Canais de comunicação abertos. A que devemos este prazer?
O Cetro Escarlate reconhece seu pedido de comércio, prossiga.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Que míseras ofertas você traz aos grandiosos Shakarn? Ouviremos seus pedidos.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Saudações, venerável {STR_leaderName}. Os Shakarn estão abertos ao comércio.
Agradecemos o pedido e consideraremos sua oferta.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Os sonoscriptos Shakarn registrarão nossa destruição de seu lamentável império. {STR_reasons}, você realmente achou que poderíamos perdoar seus atos?

{STR_reasons} is a list of reasons, written like "You trespassed" and can be found in this excel sheet. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text. {STR_reasons} is a list of reasons, written like "You trespassed" and can be found in this excel sheet. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text. {STR_reasons} is a list of reasons, written like "You trespassed" and can be found in this excel sheet. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_reasons}.[br/]Embora suas ações tenham insultado o Cetro Escarlate, estávamos preparados. Nossos agentes estão posicionados, não espere misericórdia dos Shakarn.

{STR_reasons} is a list of reasons, written like "You trespassed" and can be found in this excel sheet. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text. {STR_reasons} is a list of reasons, written like "You trespassed" and can be found in this excel sheet. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text. {STR_reasons} is a list of reasons, written like "You trespassed" and can be found in this excel sheet. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Um exemplo repugnante de {STR_playerRace}, não perca meu tempo.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Nenhuma sutileza, nenhum tato, sua própria presença é um insulto ao Cetro Escarlate.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Seus feitos serão esquecidos, as cinzas de seus ossos perdidas nos ventos do tempo.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Sua habilidade em combate e táticas astutas são admiráveis, comandante {STR_leaderName}.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Você conquistou o respeito de um general, {STR_leaderName}. Com o tempo, nossos impérios podem se tornar grandes aliados.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Sonoscripts falarão do justo {STR_leaderName}; é um privilégio termos negócios com você.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Este é um acordo aceitável. Ambos sairemos ganhando com isso.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Aceitamos seu acordo, mas saiba que já recusamos ofertas melhores que esta.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Você superestima seu valor, {STR_leaderName}. Recusamos sua oferta.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Esta oferta insignificante é um insulto. Recusamos.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
